body.p: On the Checkout page you can review your cart and choose either the Existing User, New or Guest profile to use when checking out. The checkout user profile is displayed beside the payment information section. The cart total is displayed in the Cart Summary section and an itemized list of purchases is displayed in the Checkout Summary section.
You can manage your order on the Checkout page. To increase or decrease order quantities or remove an item you should do the following.

ul.li: Locate the item you wish to manage in the Checkout Summary.
To increase or decrease the quantity to purchase type a number or press the arrow keys.
To remove an item from the Checkout Summary, click the Remove button.
To complete the checkout process chose your profile and payment method.

body.p: As an Existing User, after reviewing your purchases, you will log into your account to complete your purchase.

ul.li: Enter the email address and password associated with your account.
Click Login. To stay logged on, click the checkbox Keep me logged in.
Your profile information stored with your account will display, e.g., email address, username, phone number, company, first and last name.

body.p: New users should use the following steps to complete your purchase:

ul.li: Click the New User tab to create a profile.
Provide a username and your email address.
Type an password and confirm your password in the next field.
Provide your first and last name, company name, if applicable, and your phone number.

body.p: Note: If there is an account associated with the supplied email address you will be prompted to use the existing account.

You have the option to checkout without logging in. An email address and name are required to process guest payments, however no user account will be created. If there is an account associated with the supplied email address you will be prompted to use the existing account, but you may opt to continue the checkout process as a Guest.
To checkout as a Guest you should do the following:

ul.li: Provide your first and last name, and email address.
After the payment is received, the Confirmation Page will display.
